title: Andy Duncan (Bullrun)
description: Andy Duncan creator of Bullrun and Gumball 3000 joins us to talk about rallying, the new Porsche GT3 RS, strip clubs, Coos Bay Oregon, 24 Hours of Lemons, the Noble M400 and European travel.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: Andy Duncan creator of Bullrun and Gumball 3000 joins us to talk about rallying, the new Porsche GT3 RS, strip clubs, Coos Bay Oregon, 24 Hours of Lemons, the Noble M400 and European travel.
